name: My Journal
description: My Journal is a safe space for users to keep track of their thoughts, feelings, experiences, and moods.

name: CinemOpinion
description: A web app for movie lovers! Here, you can read Movie and TV show reviews as well as write your own.

name: DTox
description: A web app to help inform users about what toxic chemicals may be in their everyday lives.

name: Tipsy-Turvey
description: A simple web application that allows you to click a button to get a picture and recipe of a random cocktail.
